Our dresses are designed to fit the following size bodies perfectly.

Plus – thanks to some clever designs and fabric choices all of our sizes have a little stretch and so for further guidance on picking the best size for you please see the range of body measurements below that we think each size flatters the most.

However please don’t despair if you measure yourself and you don’t fall any one size – remember at BRAZEN you can mix and match sizes for the top and bottom on many of our dresses or provide key body measurements and 400 HKD for a fully customized size (see how to measure)
